page.title: 01THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: Our area is situated on the southern shore of {BELFAST LOUGH}about 16 km east of Belfast.The area is mainly sea which includes a busy shipping lane where ships of all sizes and descriptions ply their way to and from Belfast docks. Most of the land in this block is privately owned by two educational establishments and one 18 hole golf course.There are,however,three residential areas:- { GLENCRAIG, SEAHILL}and{CRAIGAVAD These areas are served by a single church in Glencraig whose present vicar is the Reverend Canon A. Maconachie.It is a Church of Ireland (Anglican) establishment so people of other denominations have to travel outside the area to their churches (CONTINUED)
